direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve inserting elements into the list, but addAll inserts multiple elements while insert inserts a single element at a specified index.
Both methods modify the list structure by either adding or removing elements, involving similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods modify the list by either adding elements (addAll) or removing all elements (clear), affecting the list's state.
Both methods access and modify elements at specific indices within the list, though set replaces an existing element while addAll adds new elements.
Both methods depend on the internal structure of the list, with toArray converting the list to an array and addAll modifying the list's structure.
